sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container
    class="fill-height"
    fluid
    style="min-height: 434px"
  >
    <v-fade-transition mode="out-in">
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="6" class="item" v-for="item in list" :key="item._id">
          <v-card>
            <v-img
              :src="item.publicPath"
              :lazy-src="item.publicPath"
            aspect-ratio="1"
              class="grey lighten-2"
            ></v-img>
            <v-card-title class="text-h6">
              {{item.name}}
            </v-card-title>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>

      </v-row>
    </v-fade-transition>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>

export default {
 
  data() {
    return {
       
      list:[]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async getForEventList() {
    
      var TToken=localStorage.getItem('token');
       //console.log(TToken);
      await this.$api
        .get("events?merchantId="+this.$route.query.ID,{
            headers:{
                'wsc-token':TToken
            }

        })

        .then((response) => {
          console.log(response)
        
          this.list= response.data.data.events;
        
        })
        .catch((e) => {
       
          console.log(e);
        });
    },

   
    refeshData() {
      this.getForEventList();
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getForEventList();
  },


};
</script>
